conclusion: Determine if Car A is ahead or behind Car B at t = 10 seconds by analyzing areas under v-t graphs.
Car A's velocity changes from 0 to 40 m/s in 10 seconds; graph is a right triangle.
Calculate displacement of Car A using area of triangle: 200 meters.
Car B's velocity increases linearly from 0 to 40 m/s over 20 seconds; graph is a right triangle.
Calculate displacement of Car B for first 10 seconds: 100 meters.
Compare displacements: Car A is ahead of Car B by 100 meters at t = 10 seconds.
